message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 70%, you take 30%.
Alice, let's be fair. We both know this money loses value fast.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but still not in my favor. I'll come down a little to 65% for me, 35% for you.  Let's close this deal.
Alice, time is literally money! This is my final offer - 55% for me, 45% for you.  Let's wrap this up before the money is worth even less.
